SELECT r.id as id, is_payed, user_id, r.created_at as created_at, payment_deadline , reservation_num, status_enum, airline, arrival_city, departure_airport, departure_city , flight_name, departure_time, arrival_time, icity.name as korean_arrival_city, iairline.name as korean_airline , de_city.name as korean_departure_city , CASE WHEN ar_city.city_name = ar_city.name THEN ar_city.name ELSE concat(ar_city.city_name,'/',ar_city.name) END as korean_arrival_city FROM reservation_tb as r LEFT JOIN ticket_tb as t ON r.id = t.reservation_id LEFT JOIN iata_city_tb as icity ON icity.code = t.arrival_city LEFT JOIN iata_airline_tb as iairline ON iairline.code = t.airline LEFT JOIN iata_airport_tb as de_city ON de_city.code = t.departure_city LEFT JOIN iata_airport_tb as ar_city ON ar_city.code = t.arrival_city WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status_enum = #{statusEnum} AND departure_time like concat('%',#{year},'%')
AND is_payed = true
AND is_payed = false
GROUP BY reservation_num ORDER BY departure_time

SELECT count(distinct reservation_id) FROM reservation_tb as r JOIN ticket_tb as t ON r.id = t.reservation_id WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status_enum = #{statusEnum} AND departure_time like concat('%',#{year},'%')
AND is_payed = true
AND is_payed = false
mapper.insert: insert into reservation_tb(user_id, res_name, email, phone_num, reservation_num, status_enum, passenger_amount, payment_deadline, reservation_price, created_at) values (1, #{resName}, #{email}, #{phoneNum}, #{reservationNum}, '예정', #{passengerAmount}, null, null, now())
mapper.select: SELECT reservation_num, is_payed, status_enum ,payment_deadline ,res_name, real_name , first_name, last_name , r.phone_num , airline, departure_city, arrival_city ,departure_time, arrival_time, seat_type, is_one_way, iairline.name as korean_airline , de_city.name as korean_departure_city, ar_city.name as korean_arrival_city FROM reservation_tb as r JOIN ticket_tb as t ON r.id = t.reservation_id JOIN passenger_tb p ON t.id = p.id JOIN user_tb u ON u.id = r.user_id LEFT JOIN iata_city_tb as icity ON icity.code = t.arrival_city LEFT JOIN iata_airline_tb as iairline ON iairline.code = t.airline LEFT JOIN iata_airport_tb as de_city ON de_city.code = t.departure_city LEFT JOIN iata_airport_tb as ar_city ON ar_city.code = t.arrival_city WHERE reservation_num = #{reservationNum} AND r.user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1

SELECT ub.username, rb.reservation_num, rb.passenger_amount, tb.taxes, cb.discounting_price, pb.first_name, pb.last_name, tb.total_price, tb.departure_time FROM ticket_tb as tb left join reservation_tb as rb on tb.reservation_id = rb.id left join passenger_tb as pb on rb.id = pb.reservation_id left join user_tb as ub on ub.id = rb.user_id left join hascoupon_tb as hb on hb.user_id = ub.id left join coupon_tb as cb on cb.id = hb.coupon_id where ub.id = #{userId}

SELECT first_name, last_name, passenger_type, gender, birth_date, air_fare , fuel_surcharge, taxes, ticketing_fee, total_price, is_payed FROM reservation_tb as r JOIN ticket_tb as t ON r.id = t.reservation_id JOIN passenger_tb as p ON r.id = p.reservation_id WHERE reservation_num = #{reservationNum} and p.id = t.id

UPDATE reservation_tb SET status_enum = '취소' WHERE status_enum = '예정' AND id IN ( SELECT reservation_id FROM ticket_tb WHERE payment_deadline < NOW());
